title: Systemutvecklare integrationer
description:
*Vill du vara med och driva en av pensionsbranschens mest spännande transformationer? Hos oss får du arbeta med de senaste teknikerna, vara en nyckelspelare i ett affärsnära integrationsteam och bidra till framtidens smarta och hållbara lösningar. Vi erbjuder en arbetsmiljö där samarbete, engagemang och innovation står i centrum – och där du får möjlighet att påverka och utvecklas tillsammans med branschens mest engagerade medarbetare.*


**Om jobbet**  

Som systemutvecklare hos Länsförsäkringar Fondliv blir du en nyckelperson i vår IT-utvecklingsgrupp och får arbeta nära både verksamheten och tekniken. Du ingår i ett tvärfunktionellt agilt team som arbetar enligt SAFe-ramverket, där samarbete och kontinuerlig utveckling står i centrum. Vi befinner oss i en spännande fas av digital förändring, där vi moderniserar våra system och plattformar för att möta framtidens behov inom pensionssparande. Hos oss får du möjlighet att påverka tekniska lösningar och vara med på resan mot en mer automatiserad och integrerad IT-miljö. Du bidrar till att skapa hållbara och innovativa lösningar som gör skillnad för både verksamheten och våra kunder, samtidigt som du utvecklas tillsammans med engagerade kollegor i en långsiktig och affärsnära roll.



Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:


* Utveckla och förvalta integrationer i både Java och .NET
* Stötta förflyttningen från Java till .NET i befintliga och nya lösningar
* Integrera mot Lumera WS med både REST och SOAP
* Bygga integrationer mellan Lumera och intilliggande system (handläggarsystem, rådgivningssystem, Mina sidor m.fl.)
* Drifta och optimera tjänster i Azure och OpenShift containerlösning
* Delta aktivt i vår DevOps-resa och bidra till effektiva CI/CD-flöden
* Säkerställa hög kvalitet och långsiktighet i lösningarna
* Utveckla ny funktionalitet samt förbättringsarbete och rättningar i våra system
* Testa att nya och förbättrade funktioner är korrekt utvecklade
* Vara en aktiv medlem i utvecklingsteamet och bidra till att driva utvecklingsarbetet framåt


**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

Personalvillkor på bolån och blancolån


Rabatt på sak-, person- och djurförsäkring


Friskvårdsbidrag och friskvårdstimma


Gym & gruppträning på kontoret


Lunchförmån


Fyra extra lediga dagar/år utöver semesterdagarna


Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:


* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling i både Java och .NET
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av integration mot Lumera WS (REST och SOAP)
* Gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta med Lumera, inklusive förståelse för försäkringsproduktkomplexitet och pensionsaffären
* God förståelse för, eller erfarenhet av, integrationer mot system som handläggarsystem, rådgivningssystem och Mina sidor
* Erfarenhet av drift i både Azure och OpenShift containerlösningar
* Erfarenhet inom pensionsbranschen
* Kandidatexamen inom datavetenskap, informationsteknik eller likvärdigt



Meriterande är även om du har:


* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-flöden, automation och DevOps-arbetssätt
* Kunskap om Domain-Driven Design och microservices-arkitektur
* Arbetat med dokumentflöden
* Vana att använda GitHub Copilot eller liknande verktyg i ditt dagliga arbete
* Intresse för AI och dess möjligheter i utvecklingsarbetet



Som person har du ett starkt fokus på att bygga lösningar som levererar kontinuerligt kundvärde och tar ansvar för det du skapar. Du har ett högt engagemang och driv, är självgående och visar starkt självledarskap. Du är en sann lagspelare som bidrar med positiv energi och prestigelöshet, och du trivs med att samarbeta nära verksamheten. Din kommunikativa och analytiska förmåga gör att du är hjälpsam, lyhörd och har lätt för att se helheten, samtidigt som du är nyfiken och vågar utmana för att hitta de bästa lösningarna.


**Kontaktuppgifter:**  

Rekryterande chef: Katerina Georgiadou, katerina.georgiadou@lansforsakringar.se



Facklig representant Forena: Susanne Hirsch, Susanne.Hirsch2@lansforsakringar.se  

Facklig representant Akademikerföreningen: Bitte Franzén Molander, Bitte.Franzen-Molander@lansforsakringar.se


*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*


  
Länsförsäkringar AB är en inkluderande arbetsplats där mod, möjligheter och engagemang står i centrum. Vi erbjuder ett hållbart arbetsliv med flexibla villkor och satsar på att alla medarbetare ska kunna växa och trivas, oavsett bakgrund.


Fondliv är Länsförsäkringsgruppens fondförsäkringsbolag och en ledande aktör inom pensionssparande, särskilt inom tjänstepension. Vår verksamhet präglas av ett starkt kundfokus och ett målmedvetet arbete för att leverera trygga och kvalitativa sparlösningar. Hos oss är du med och bidrar till att människor får det pensionsliv de önskar – ett arbete som verkligen gör skillnad.



Vill du vara med och forma framtidens pensionslösningar? Hos Fondliv får du chansen att växa, utvecklas och göra skillnad – varje dag.


  
Katerina Georgiadou | Kontaktperson
company_description: Vill du vara en del av lösningen, när livet förändras?

title: Business Developer Manager
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens intralogistik? Har du ett starkt affärsdriv och trivs i en roll där analys, prospektering och kunddialog går hand i hand? Då kan detta vara nästa steg för dig.

**Element Logic** är ett teknik‑ och intralogistikföretag som sedan 1985 har specialiserat sig på automatiserade lagerlösningar. Som världens första och största AutoStore‑integratör utvecklar vi intelligenta och skalbara lösningar som hjälper företag att arbeta snabbare, smartare och mer hållbart.


Med huvudkontor i Norge och verksamhet i Europa, USA och Asien är Element Logic i stark global tillväxt. I dag är vi omkring 1 000 medarbetare som kombinerar djup kompetens med modern robotteknik och mjukvaruutveckling, och som tillsammans bidrar till att stärka vår position som en ledande aktör inom intelligent lagerautomatisering.


Som **Business Development Manager** hos Element Logic spelar du en avgörande roll i vår fortsatta tillväxt. Du ansvarar för att identifiera och utveckla nya affärsmöjligheter genom strukturerad prospektering, marknadsanalys och tidig kunddialog.


Du arbetar nära försäljningsledningen och Sales Managers och fokuserar på att skapa ett stabilt inflöde av kvalificerade affärsmöjligheter kopplade till vår växande systemportfölj.

**Dina ansvarsområden**

* Identifiera och utveckla nya affärsmöjligheter genom avancerade marknads- och branschanalyser, där AI‑verktyg, prediktiva insikter och datadriven segmentering används för att prioritera rätt kunder och möjligheter.
* Aktivt prospektera nya kunder och marknader genom proaktiva kontakter och cold calling
* Bygga och förvalta strukturerade prospektdatabaser per sektor
* Genomföra avancerad förkvalificering av prospekt och ta fram initiala offertförslag
* Planera och genomföra första kundmöten och presentationer
* Säkerställa effektiv överlämning av kvalificerade leads till Sales Managers
* Bidra till och uppdatera Go-to-Market-strategin
* Identifiera relevanta branschevenemang och bidra till företagets marknadsnärvaro
* Ansvara för företagets synlighet i sociala medier tillsammans med interna intressenter

**Vi söker dig som**

* Har akademisk examen inom ekonomi, marknadsföring eller teknisk bakgrund
* Har minst 3–5 års erfarenhet av affärsutveckling, B2B-försäljning eller prospektering
* Har ett starkt affärssinne och ett strukturerat, analytiskt arbetssätt
* Trivs med proaktiv kundbearbetning och att skapa nya affärsmöjligheter
* Har ett intresse för tekniska lösningar inom automation, robotisering eller systemförsäljning
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift
* Van att arbeta i MS Office 365 och datadrivna verktyg såsom CRM-system, marknads- och försäljningsanalys samt AI-baserade stödverktyg.


Erfarenhet inom intralogistik, automation eller konsultverksamhet är meriterande men inget krav.

 **Som person** är du lösnings- och resultatfokuserad med en stark drivkraft att nå uppsatta mål. Du är uthållig, stresstålig och trivs i ett högt tempo där prioriteringar snabbt kan skifta. Med din relationsskapande personlighet och goda kommunikativa förmåga bygger du förtroende och skapar långsiktiga samarbeten, både internt och externt. Du känner dig trygg i att representera företaget i kundmöten och vid branschevenemang och uppträder alltid professionellt som ambassadör för verksamheten. Samtidigt är du en lagspelare som samarbetar effektivt och engagerat med kollegor för att nå gemensamma mål.

 **Arbetsplats:** Lund, Sverige – hybrid

**Startdatum:** Enligt överenskommelse, så snart som möjligt

**Anställningsform:** Tillsvidareanställning

  

För ytterligare frågor om rollen eller rekryteringsprocessen, vänligen kontakta

**Lene Berg** at **lene.berg@elementlogic.net**.

 ***Agency notice:*** *We’re proud to handle all our recruitment in-house at Element Logic. That means we don’t accept candidates or approaches from external recruiters or headhunters. All hiring processes are managed exclusively by our own specialized Talent Acquisition team.*

 **Be yourself, in your element**


At Element Logic, our people are our greatest resource. We believe individuals should be in their element and we recognize, celebrate, and nurture the strength of diversity. We offer equal opportunities and welcome applicants regardless of age, race, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, language, national origin, mental and physical abilities, religious and political affiliations, stage of life, or family circumstances. We desire a work environment where people flourish with their unique abilities, perspectives, and life experiences.

**About Element Logic**


Element Logic is a technology company that optimizes warehouses for customers to gain a competitive edge. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Norway. It operates worldwide and is the world`s first and largest AutoStore-partner. Element Logic offers its customers automated robotic solutions, software, and consulting services.


Total revenue for 2023 was EUR 471 million. For more information go to elementlogic.net and follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook and Youtube.

title: Erfaren frontendutvecklare
description:
### **Så roligt att du har hittat hit!**


Hoppas att vi kan väcka din nyfikenhet ytterligare – och att vi får möjlighet att lära känna varandra lite bättre.


Vi på Ninetech har ett tydligt DNA. Vi vet varför vi går till jobbet och vad som krävs för att det ska vara både kul och meningsfullt. Det genomsyrar hur vi är mot varandra, hur vårt kontor känns – och vilka kunder vi väljer att arbeta med.


En Ninetech:are vill jobba i långa relationer med intressanta kunder som delar vår syn på ett hållbart samhälle. Hen uppskattar rutinerade kollegor, beprövade arbetssätt och gemensam riktning – men vill samtidigt ha frihet, ansvar och möjlighet att påverka. Och inte minst: arbeta på ett bolag som hela tiden vill framåt.


Det är de här människorna du kommer att omges av. Och det är det här DNA:t vi hoppas att även du känner igen dig i. Där du tar med dig din energi, nyfikenhet och klokhet – och delar den med oss.

#### **Utvecklare med frontendfokus. Stämmer det här in på dig?**


Som konsult hos oss så har du ett stort ansvar. Vi ser att du har förmåga att se till helheten i projektet utifrån din roll och ditt kompetensområde. Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta i team med andra roller och vet hur viktigt ert samspel är för att leverera just den höga kvalitet och långsiktighet vi står för. De tekniker och verktyg du arbetar med till vardags är främst HTML/CSS, JavaScript (där vi använder TypeScript), samt ramverk som Solid och Vue. Hos oss anpassas valen av tekniker, verktyg och ramverk efter behov vilket innebär stor variation i ditt arbete.

##### **Förmågor du besitter**

* Du har erfarenhet av att jobba i ett agilt team i en professionell miljö
* Du håller dig uppdaterad kring, och är intresserad av ny teknik inom frontend
* Du är bekväm med att bygga prototyper för att hjälpa till att utforska eller validera nya förslag
* Du gillar att skapa och designa koncept tillsammans med designers och kunder

#### **Detta får du hos oss**


Vårt namn till trots är vi inte ett renodlat techbolag. Vi jobbar i tvärfunktionella team, mycket nära våra kunder – från strategi och analys till genomförande, förvaltning och förbättring.


Hos oss får du:

* Kollegor som gärna delar med sig av sin kunskap
* Tid och stöd att utvecklas på riktigt
* En kultur där det är okej att fråga, testa och lära
* Långsiktighet både i kundrelationer och i din egen utveckling


Vi söker dig som gör det du tror på, lär av misstag och vill skapa förbättringar. Ta chansen och väx tillsammans med oss!

**Varaktighet:** Heltid, tillsvidare  

**Upplägg:** Flexibelt – utgångspunkt minst 50 % närvaro på kontoret  

**Ansökan:** Urval och intervjuer sker löpande

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**This is Coody**
 We’re one of Sweden’s fastest-growing tech consultancies, expanding in both people and revenue. We attribute our growth to our simple yet powerful approach to Gravity-Free Consulting, combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 At Coody, we believe in freedom, trust, and ambition, which means you’ll feel like a freelancer with free rein on assignments that excite you, while enjoying the benefits of being employed by a company that invests in your growth.
   

  

 Our senior sales team has built a vast, carefully curated client network, enabling our consultants to work with some of the most innovative companies in Sweden, Finland, the US, and the UK across Gaming, Fintech, Medtech, AI, SaaS, Aviation, and Automotive, tackling real technical challenges while shaping their own career paths.
   

  

 We’re a
 **diverse community of ambitious tech professionals** 
 , representing more than
 **14 nationalities** 
 .
   

  

**Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy** 
 . Everything we do is designed to help you work and live according to your own priorities and ambitions. If you’re curious to see how this works in practice,
 **explore our Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that truly puts consultants first.
   

  

**Why Coody**
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a lean and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no extravagant conferences. Instead we give you:
   

  

**Maximized Compensation.** 
 Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 . No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security.** 
 High salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shape the Future.** 
 Projects and assignments for digital game changers like Spotify, Hemnet, Visa, Tobii, Toca Boca, Mojang, Flightradar24, SJ, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
 As a
 **Senior Front-end Developer** 
 at Coody, you’ll help build and scale new and existing products with real end-to-end ownership of the service, the code, and the outcomes. Assignments are typically 6-24 months, and as a consultant you’re expected to ramp up quickly and deliver value from day one. While your home base is frontend using JavaScript and TypeScript, you’ll sometimes work across the full tech stack (e.g., integrations, cloud infrastructure, CI/CD) to ship complete solutions. You’ll design and build scalable, robust frontend applications, contribute to architecture and testing/automation, and play an active role in a teams of different sizes.
   

  

 Who you are
   

  

 We are seeking a
 **Frontend Engineer with at least 5+ years of experience** 
 . You must have a proven ability to get things done. Here’s what we’re seeking:
   

  

* At least 5+ years of experience using JavaScript and TypeScript
* Solid skills in modern libraries and frameworks such as Next.js, React, Vue.js, Svelte, Node, NestJS, Angular, Express.js, Solid, React Native.
* A degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Based in Sweden: You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, temporary or permanent residency.
* Fluent in English (spoken and written).


 How to apply
   

  

 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criterias? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Frontend Infra Engineer
description:
**About The Role**
 You’ll own the core web stack at Sana - from our TypeScript/React frontend to the Node services, tooling, and monorepo infrastructure that power it. This is a role for engineers who love unblocking others: you’ll design and maintain the build systems, frameworks, and developer workflows that let teams ship fast, safely, and with confidence. You’ll work on everything from core web architecture and performance to CI, testing, and local development, ensuring our web platform is modern, secure, and a joy to build on.
   

  

****In this role, you will****
* Own and evolve Sana’s TypeScript/React/Node foundations, including frameworks, services, and conventions
* Maintain and improve our monorepo tooling: build tools, dependency management, scripts, and shared services
* Design and refine local development, testing, and build workflows so they’re fast, reliable, and easy to use
* Optimize web performance, reliability, and security across our frontend and Node services
* Shape and implement our testing strategy (unit, integration, end-to-end, visual) and related tooling
* Maintain and improve CI/CD pipelines, including caching, checks, and deployment workflows
* Define and champion best practices for web development, debugging, and observability across teams
* Collaborate closely with product engineers to identify friction points and remove them through better tooling and architecture


****What success looks like****
* Developers move quickly and confidently: local dev, testing, and builds feel fast, predictable, and low-friction
* Our monorepo, build system, and dependencies are well-structured, well-documented, and easy to maintain
* Core web flows are performant, secure, and observable—from frontend interactions to Node services
* CI/CD pipelines and test infrastructure are stable, discoverable, and trusted by engineers
* Framework and dependency upgrades are routine, low-risk, and keep us at the forefront of the TypeScript/React ecosystem
* You’re seen as a go-to engineer for web architecture, performance, and developer experience - raising the bar for how we build, ship, and maintain software at Sana.


****Our tech stack****
 We build on a simple modern stack optimized for both humans and AI.
   

  

* Backend: TypeScript, Kotlin, Node.js
* Frontend: TypeScript, React, Tailwind
* Databases: Postgres, Redis
* Cloud infra: GCP/Kubernetes/Terraform


****What we offer****
* Help shape AI's future alongside brilliant minds from Notion, Dropbox, Slack, Databricks, Google, McKinsey, and BCG.
* Competitive salary and compensation package
* Swift professional growth in an evolving environment, supported by a culture of continuous feedback and mentorship from senior leaders.
* Work with talented teammates across 5+ countries, and collaborate with customers globally
* Regular team gatherings and events (recently in Italy and South Africa)

title: Node.js developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Strong experience in backend development of complex systems
* Experience with TypeScript and Node.js, or a strong JavaScript background with the ability to ramp up quickly
* Hands-on experience with AWS and cloud-native development
* Experience designing system architecture from the ground up
* Solid experience in data modeling for business-critical systems
* Strong understanding of transactional workflows and domain-driven business logic


**Application deadline:** 
 04-02-2026
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**Expleo** 
 is seeking a highly skilled and experienced
 **Fullstack Developer** 
 to join our team in
 **Sweden** 
 (located in Gothenburg OR Stockholm).
   

  

 Our
 **ideal** 
 candidate has an always-on mindset with a strong background in designing, configuring, and managing solutions for devices, tools, and applications in a factory/corporate setting.
   

  

 If you are a full-stack engineer looking to expand your skill set, we'd love to hear from you. Join our team today and take the next step in your career!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Understand and reflect on the customer needs to bring value to the organization.
* Take part in the development cycle using innovative technologies and frameworks.
* Secure qualitative, efficient and performance deliveries.
* Provide input for the design and construction of test cases and scenarios and help validate executed test results.
* Contribute to boosting the team to continually increase knowledge, competence, performance, and innovation
* Collaborate with suppliers, architects, engineers, developers, and internal stakeholders on upcoming and innovative technologies and standardization.
* Collaborate with the local IT site teams for problem/opportunity analysis.


**Qualifications**
* Hold a bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science or equivalent experience in a relevant field.
* Knowledge and experience in agile development practices, ITIL (incident, problem & change process), collaboration tools (such as Azure DevOps or similar)
* Java development & support, relational databases (Oracle, SQL server, My SQL).
* Eager to learn and grow (yourself and the company) using a modern approach to Software Engineering.
* Ability to work under rapidly changing conditions and have the capability to identify, mitigate and decide on solutions when facing obstacles.
* You are fluent in English, both verbally and written.
* You should have a general understanding of production processes and understand how all these things work together to make end user applications work well.
* Knowledge of the automotive industry is meritorious.


**Experience**
* Knowledge about databases (MS SQL (Azure))
* Development platforms (Java, OpenShift, ...)
* Azure Cloud (App services, AKS Azure Kubernetes Cluster)
* SQL server for database
* Azure Storage, Azure Container Services
* Frameworks (Spring, Springboot, WebFlux, ...)
* Messaging (MQ, Kafka, REST API, ...)
* Front-end (Angular)
* Test Driven Development (Unit testing in Spring Boot and Angular, in memory database testing using Mockito)
* Agile processes (Safe / Scrum / ADO) but also about backlog management, strategic planning, business relationship management, problem analysis and business modelling.
* Bonus points for having relevant experience using docker containers and orchestration with Kubernetes.


**Benefits**
**Who are we?**
 Expleo is a rapidly growing consulting company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions in the fields of AI engineering, digitalization, hyper-automation, cybersecurity, and data science. With a strong commitment to integrity, diversity, sustainability, and societal security, Expleo is at the forefront of creating a better future. Join our dynamic team and be part of our journey to shape the future of technology and business.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
* Collaborative working environment – we stand shoulder to shoulder with our clients and our peers through good times and challenges
* We empower all passionate technology loving professionals by allowing them to expand their skills and take part in inspiring projects
* Expleo Academy - enables you to acquire and develop the right skills by delivering a suite of accredited training courses
* Always working as one team, our people are not afraid to think big and challenge the status quo
* Collective agreement with the union
* Access to a collection of benefits and discounted prices on services and shops.
* Health benefits
* Expleo team activities


 "We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race, sex, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation or age ”.

title: Java Developer in Process Automation Team | SEB, Solna
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
**About The Role**
 This role offers a rare chance to shape the future of financial crime prevention through technology. As a core contributor, you'll craft an entirely new way of working for our FCP Investigators, empowering them with intuitive, efficient workflow tools to uncover and act on suspicious activity faster than ever before. Your work will make investigative tools more efficient and impactful, enabling investigators to protect society from financial crime. You'll also be at the forefront of innovation, as the FCP Process Automation team has developed an innovative GenAI assistant that redefines how intelligence is captured and transformed. If you're passionate about future-proof technology, process efficiency, and making a real-world difference, this is the role to apply for.
   

  

 As Java developer you will be cooperating with specialists from the team (Workflow Developers, Data Engineers) to create automated processes and ensure integration with the company systems. The team is distributed between Solna and Warsaw.
   

  

**As a Java Developer in FCP Process Automation Team, you will be responsible for, but not limited to:**
* Designing and implementing components to integrate internal FCP systems with process automation solution
* Collaborating with developers in the team and with IT architects on defining the process implementation design
* Helping business to understand technical capabilities, suggesting best possible solutions and explaining limitations
* Defining way of working practices, suggesting and implementing improvements


**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Experience with Java
* General knowledge or experience with Kafka, MongoDB, OpenShift
* Front-end development (experience with JavaScript or TypeScript, HTML/CSS and modern frameworks is a plus)
* Experience in designing systems and data flows
* Experience in business process analysis and automation or similar field would be considered as an advantage
* Experience with cloud services (GCP) and infrastructure as a code (Terraform)
* Experience in Prompt Engineering, LLM tuning and Developing Agentic AI software
* Experience as a Tech Lead would be considered as advantage
* Experience with working in Scrum
* Ability to learn and adapt to changes quickly
* Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken


**What We Offer**
* We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
* Extensive training and learning opportunities.
* Work-life balance.
* International opportunities and working environment.
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits.
* Innovative company in forefront of technology.


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to SEB and our team. Since we meet candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than
 **2026-01-31** 
 .
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from. SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which is why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.

title: Senior Software Developer (Network Infrastructure)
description:
**Job Description**

**WHAT YOU’LL DO**




 We’re looking for a
 **Senior Software Developer** 
 with
 **Network automation experience,** 
 to join our Networking team and help automate and optimize
 
 global network infrastructure. In this role, you’ll build tools and platforms that enhance visibility, resilience, and deployment speed across retail, warehouse, and data center environments. You’ll work closely with network engineers and architects to design scalable systems for multi-vendor networks (
 **Cisco, Aruba) and cloud connectivity (Azure).** 
  

  





 In addition to the above, your role will involve:
   

  




* Design, develop, and implement network automation solutions using
 **Python and Ansible.**
* Manage and maintain
 **Linux-based systems** 
 .
* Apply DevOps principles to streamline workflows, including
 **CI/CD processes** 
 .
* Oversee software development processes, including
 **testing, code analysis** 
 , and release management.
* Lead network automation initiatives with a focus on routing, switching, and working with Cisco and Aruba technologies.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive projects to completion.
* Independently manage development tasks and initiatives, even in the absence of clear direction.



**WHO YOU’LL WORK WITH** 
  

  





 You’ll be working closely with our
 **Networking team** 
 to design and evolve our global network infrastructure across data centers, warehouses, and retail environments. This is a collaborative environment where the team operates cutting-edge technology that’s always on, while also fostering a culture of fun and teamwork.
   

  





**WHO YOU ARE**




 We are looking for people to have experience with...
   

  




* Proficiency in
 **Python** 
 and at least one other programming language.
* Experience with
 **network automation frameworks.**
* Understanding of networking fundamentals (TCP/IP, DNS, routing, switching).
* Familiarity with CI/CD workflows and tools.
* Experience with REST APIs, event-driven systems, and webhook-based integrations.
* Knowledge of data modeling and API integration with systems.
* Knowledge of AI/ML development is a plus.



 Nice to have:
   

  




* Master’s in Computer Science, Network Engineering, Data Science, or related field.
* Experience automating Cisco, Aruba, or cloud networking.
* Knowledge of hybrid cloud environments.
* Advanced Python skills.
* Hands-on with Ansible and Linux systems.
* Proven DevOps experience (CI/CD workflows).
* Strong grasp of software development best practices.
* 4–5 years in network automation.
* Expertise in routing, switching, and Cisco/Aruba technologies.
* Ability to work independently and in teams.



 And people who are…
   

  




* Strong analytical and problem-solving mindset.
* Able to work independently and collaboratively in a global team.
* Passionate about innovation, automation, and continuous improvement.
* Excellent in communication and documentation skills.



**WHO WE ARE** 
  

  





 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  





 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  





**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE** 
  

  





 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  




* **Staff discount card:** 
 Usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online.
* **H&M Incentive Program (HIP** 
 ): Included in our HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
* **Competitive pensions** 
 : Collective Agreement and ITP pensions competitive to the Swedish market.
* **Generous vacation** 
 : 30 days' vacation, health care allowance, and good work-life balance.
* **Additional perks** 
 : Discounts from Benify.
* **Innovative Environment:** 
 Work with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions.
* **Global Impact** 
 : Be part of a team that influences users worldwide.
* **Professional Growth** 
 : Endless opportunities to learn and develop your skills.
* **Collaborative Culture** 
 : Join a motivated team that values collaboration and excellence.



**JOIN US** 
  

  





 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  





 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.

title: Full Stack Developer wanted for Healthcare Scale Up - Node, React, TypeScript
description:
**Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Backend-focused) | Stockholm** 




  





 We’re looking for
 **2 Senior Full-Stack Engineers** 
 to join a small, highly experienced team in the
 **healthtech sector** 
 at a fast-growing European product company. The team works on
 **business-critical systems** 
 that handle complex workflows at scale.
 



  





 This is a hands-on role. You’ll be building features
 **end-to-end** 
 and shaping how the platform scales as the company grows into new markets.
 



  





**What you’ll work on** 



* An internal web platform used daily to assess and resolve customer cases
* Automation and decision systems that interpret incoming data and handle processes end-to-end
* Designing and implementing
 **backend-heavy systems (60/40)** 
 with frontend integration
* Scaling services and maintaining robustness, performance, and security across multiple markets



  





**Tech stack** 



* **Backend:** 
 Node.js, Python, TypeScript
* **Frontend:** 
 React, Next.js
* GraphQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB
* AWS (foundations team handles most infra, but experience matters)
* Exposure to automation and AI/LLM tools is a plus



  





**Who they’re looking for** 



* Around
 **8+ years of experience** 
 as a full-stack or backend-focused engineer
* Strong experience with
 **Node.js, Python, React, and Next.js**
* Comfortable with system design, architecture, and integrations
* Product-minded - you understand how what you build will be used and why it matters
* Experience building
 **production systems at scale** 
 with real users and real data



 The team values engineers who are curious, self-starting, and enjoy solving complex technical challenges.
 



  





**Why it’s exciting** 



* Working on a
 **core product at real scale** 
 , impacting thousands of users every day
* Ownership of systems that are critical to the business
* Collaborative team with highly experienced engineers
* Opportunity to build systems that will scale across new markets and regions



  





 If you’re a senior engineer who enjoys working on challenging, meaningful systems, then feel free to apply or drop me a message!

title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Vi söker en
 **Software Quality Assurance Engineer** 
 med passion för kvalitet och automatisering. I denna roll blir du en nyckelperson i utvecklingsteamet och arbetar nära utvecklare och andra intressenter för att säkerställa högsta möjliga kvalitet i avancerade mjukvarusystem. Rollen kombinerar ett strategiskt perspektiv med operativt, hands-on arbete i komplexa och säkerhetskritiska miljöer.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* 8–12 års erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling och/eller kvalitetssäkring (nivå 4)
* God kunskap om standarder för säkerhetskritiska system (RTCA/DO-178, ISO 26262, IEC 61508)
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med kvalitet i hela utvecklingscykeln
* God kommunikativ förmåga och vana att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt
* Meriterande med erfarenhet av testautomatisering och verktyg som Jenkins, Python, Git



  





**Ansvarsområden** 



* Integrera kvalitet i varje steg av mjukvaruutvecklingsprocessen tillsammans med utvecklingsteamen
* Stödja och driva arbetet med testautomatisering och kvalitetssäkring
* Säkerställa att processer och dokumentation följer relevanta branschstandarder
* Fungera som en brygga mellan utveckling, test och andra funktioner i organisationen
* Vara en ambassadör för kvalitet och bidra till kontinuerlig förbättring av arbetssätt och kultur



  





***Annat***




*Vissa av våra kunder kräver att du genomgår och blir godkänd enligt gällande säkerhetsföreskrifter. Vissa tjänster kan också kräva specifikt medborgarskap.* 




  





**Om Astek Sweden** 




 Astek drivs av nyfikenhet och en passion för vad tekniken kan möjliggöra. Den andan genomsyrar allt vi gör vårt engagemang för innovation och produktutveckling, de långsiktiga kundpartnerskap vi bygger och det värde vi skapar i varje uppdrag, varje dag. Vi grundades 1991, är en del av den globala Astek Group och samarbetar idag med ledande industriföretag från våra kontor i Mölndal, Stockholm och Linköping med över 160 kollegor i Sverige. Vi är också certifierade som Great Place to Work® och har åtagit oss att vara 100 % klimatneutrala.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 



* En inspirerande arbetsplats där teknik och kreativitet möts.
* Möjligheter att samarbeta med ledande aktörer inom industrin i utmanande projekt (mekanisk design, projektledning, elektronik och mjukvara).
* Professionell utveckling och tydliga karriärvägar, med externa utbildningar anpassade efter din utvecklingsplan.
* En stöttande, rolig och inkluderande kultur där dina idéer värdesätts och teamen lyckas tillsammans.
* Generösa förmåner, inklusive ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 SEK.



 Vi uppmuntrar ingenjörer från alla bakgrunder, kön och livssituationer att söka.
 



  





**Vill du bli en del av vårt team?** 




 Vi ser varmt fram emot din ansökan! Rekrytering sker löpande, så vänta inte med att söka. Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor.

title: Senior Android Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**

 Are you passionate about creating impactful M
 **obile experiences on Android** 
 ? We’re looking for a talented and motivated
 **Senior and Mid level Android Software Engineer** 
 to join our team and help shape the future of our mobile products.
   

  





 In this role, you’ll be at the heart of product development, collaborating closely with Product Managers, Engineering Managers, and cross-functional teams. You’ll play a key role in translating business needs into high-quality Android solutions, all while adhering to industry best practices and maintaining clean, scalable code.
   

  





**WHAT YOU’LL DO** 
  

  




* Design, develop, and maintain high-quality Android applications using Kotlin and/or Java.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deliver new features that enhance user experience.
* Write clean, efficient, and testable code following modern Android development best practices.
* Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and Agile ceremonies to ensure quality and alignment.
* Debug, troubleshoot, and optimize performance of existing applications to ensure reliability and responsiveness.
* Stay up to date with the latest Android trends, tools, and technologies, and apply them to improve development workflows.
* Ensure applications meet security standards and follow modern compliance practices.
* Contribute to improving internal development processes, tooling, and documentation for better team efficiency.



**WHO YOU’LL WORK WITH** 
  

  





 Our product teams are dedicated to building advanced internal tools that support data-driven decision-making across product development. We focus on analyzing test variations, interpreting performance data, and delivering insights that help product teams optimize feature rollouts. By collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, we ensure that new features are launched efficiently and effectively. Through continuous learning and iteration, we contribute to innovation and excellence in user experience across the organization.
   

  





**WHO YOU ARE**




 We are looking for people with...
   

  




* **2–4** 
 years of professional experience in
 **Android development** 
 . Proficiency in Kotlin (Java is a plus).
* Experience with
 **Jetpack Compose** 
 .
* Solid understanding of Android SDK, Material Design, and Jetpack components.
* Experience working with RESTful APIs, third-party libraries, and JSON.
* Familiarity with Android architectural patterns (e.g., MVVM, Clean Architecture).
* Experience with version control systems, especially Git.
* Knowledge of dependency injection frameworks (e.g., Hilt, Dagger).
* Understanding mobile app performance, memory management, and debugging tools.
* Familiarity with testing frameworks (e.g., JUnit, Espresso).
* Ability to work in an agile development environment.



 Nice to Have
   

  




* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines for Android.
* Exposure to mobile analytics tools (e.g., Firebase, Mixpanel).
* Published apps in the Google Play Store.



 And people who have:
   

  




* **Problem-Solving Skills** 
 : A logical and creative mindset to tackle challenges and deliver effective solutions, even under pressure.
* **Collaborative Spirit** 
 : The ability to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and backend developers.
* **Interpersonal Communication** 
 : A clear and thoughtful approach to articulating ideas, technical concepts, and feedback, both in writing and verbally.
* **Adaptability** 
 : Comfort with navigating change, learning new tools, and adjusting to evolving project needs.
* **Growth Mindset** 
 : Openness to feedback and a drive to continuously improve and grow professionally.



**WHO WE ARE** 
  

  





 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  





 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  





**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE** 
  

  





 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  




* **Staff discount card** 
 : Usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online.
* **H&M Incentive Program (HIP)** 
 : Included in our HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
* **Competitive pensions** 
 : Collective Agreement and ITP pensions competitive to the Swedish market.
* **Generous vacation** 
 : 30 days' vacation, health care allowance, and good work-life balance.
* **Additional perks** 
 : Discounts from Benify.
* **Innovative Environment** 
 : Work with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions.
* **Global Impact** 
 : Be part of a team that influences users worldwide.
* **Professional Growth** 
 : Endless opportunities to learn and develop your skills.
* **Collaborative Culture** 
 : Join a motivated team that values collaboration and excellence.



**JOIN US** 
  

  





 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  





 This is a full-time permanent position, starting as soon as possible according to the agreement. The role is a hybrid position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  





 Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through the career page.
   

  





 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here. We are eager to meet you!
   

  





 \*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.

title: Lead Developer / Lead Fullstackutvecklare (Zero to One)
description:
**Introduktion**
 Vi söker en senior Lead Developer till ett nyetablerat produktinitiativ där ett helt nytt digitalt erbjudande ska byggas från grunden. Uppdraget genomförs i en liten, högpresterande miljö med mycket korta beslutsvägar och nära samarbete med grundare. Fokus ligger på snabb utveckling, experimentering och att ta en produkt från första kodrad till verkliga användare.
   

  

 Detta är ett tydligt 0→1-uppdrag med högt tempo, stort eget ansvar och stark påverkan på både tekniska och produktmässiga vägval.
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning / Arbetsuppgifter**
* Leda och genomföra utvecklingen av en helt ny produkt från grunden
* Arbeta hands-on med både backend, frontend och molninfrastruktur
* Ansvara för arkitektur och tekniska helhetsbeslut
* Bygga, testa och leverera funktionalitet i högt tempo (”ship fast”)
* Arbeta nära grundare och ett mindre, dedikerat team
* Integrera AI-assisterad utveckling som en central del av arbetsflödet
* Säkerställa att lösningen är redo för produktion och verkliga användare


**Techstack**
* Backend: .NET / C#
* Frontend: TypeScript, SvelteKit, GraphQL
* Cloud: AWS
* Databases: MSSQL, Redshift


 Även aktuellt med en erfaren utvecklare som vill utvecka backend i Rust och Frontend i Next.js.
   

  

**Skallkrav**
* Mycket stark erfarenhet av fullstackutveckling (från produktidé till produktion)
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att ha levererat skarpa produkter i produktionsmiljö
* God erfarenhet av arkitekturdesign och tekniska helhetslösningar
* Erfarenhet av molninfrastruktur, företrädesvis AWS
* Vana att arbeta i miljöer med hög osäkerhet och snabba förändringar
* Praktisk och etablerad vana av AI-stöttad utveckling (obligatoriskt)
* Förmåga att ta tekniskt ledarskap och fatta självständiga beslut


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att bygga eller arbeta med gaming-, creator- eller streamingplattformar
* Bakgrund från startups eller zero-to-one-initiativ
* Erfarenhet av skalning av nya produkter efter initial lansering


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Snabb, lösningsorienterad och handlingskraftig
* Produktdriven med stark känsla för användarvärde
* Trivs i högt tempo och otydliga ramar
* Nyfiken, lärande och prestigelös
* Stark ägandekänsla och ansvarstagande


**Start:** 
 omgående
   

  

**Längd:** 
 6 månader med möjlighet till förlängning
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Placering:** 
 Stockholm, Uppsala (remote/hybrid)

title: BI Developer (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 At Agoda, we bridge the world through travel. Our story began in 2005, when two lifelong friends and entrepreneurs, driven by their passion for travel, launched Agoda to make it easier for everyone to explore the world.
   

  

 Today, we are part of Booking Holdings [NASDAQ: BKNG], with a diverse team of over 7,000 people from 90 countries, working together in offices around the globe. Every day, we connect people to destinations and experiences, with our great deals across our millions of hotels and holiday properties, flights, and experiences worldwide.
   

  

 No two days are the same at Agoda. Data and technology are at the heart of our culture, fueling our curiosity and innovation. If you’re ready to begin your best journey and help build travel for the world, join us.
   

  

**THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)
   

  

 Location: Bangkok, Thailand (\*Not open for remote work)**
**Get to Know our Team:**
 As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.
   

  

 We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 As a BI Developer, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.
   

  

**In this Role, you’ll get to** 
 :
   

  

* Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‘right questions’, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
* Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
* Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
* Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
* Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
* Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations


**What you’ll Need to Succeed** 
 :
   

  

* At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
* Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
* Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably)
* Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
* Bachelor’s degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
* A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
* Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
* Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
* Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
* A hacker’s mindset – the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
* Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
* Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
* Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
* Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.


**It’s Great if you Have:**
* MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
* Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
* Asian market experience.
* Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

title: Android Developer
description:
**About the role** 




 We are looking for an Android Developer to join our team in Stockholm. You will be working directly with our customers in dynamic and engaging projects. It is a great opportunity for a long term cooperation.
 



  





**About Codepole** 





 Codepole is a fast-growing consulting company & venture enabler. We are experts in finance, product development, and app development working with large companies (Spotify, HBO Max, Swedbank, Tele2) as well as scale ups and start ups. In addition to our consulting services, we build and launch our own ventures together with our team members.
 




  





**What we offer** 



* Challenging and interesting assignments, internally and at our client’s across the world
* An environment that allows, encourages, and supports you in your professional development
* Competitive salary
* A lot of office fun 😊



  





**Requirements** 



* 5+ years of experience.
* Proficiency in Android, Kotlin.
* Jetpack Compose
* Knowledge of Swift/SwiftUI, Java is beneficial.
* Computer Science degree preferred.
* Swedish fluency is a plus



  





**How we work** 





 We believe that it is key for our team members to grow their skill set, and that this is done by experiencing challenging technical projects and by learning from each other. The work is varied between time based projects for clients, team augmentation for clients, and our own ventures and products. This allows our team members to continuously develop as they get to experience different software, problems, and solutions. Our team members share their knowledge with each other on a daily basis, so we ensure that we learn as much as possible.
